.. attention::

   **(August 2021) Streetmix documentation has now moved!** Please update your bookmarks to `<https://docs.streetmix.net/>`_.


Google Summer of Code (index)
=============================

Student application instructions for Google Summer of Code (past and present) are archived or hosted here.
